latestInspection.result: Inspection Result:     Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that individual associated with child care service/camp involved in an act detrimental to health and safety
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Permittee/applicant submitted incomplete written safety plan
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide soap and/or paper towels or sanitary dryers accessible to children at hand wash sinks
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Appropriate and clean cots linens and other sleeping arrangements not provided by child care service at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
